phrases: Original Translation by Triad/ Softsub by Urusai
Apparently, Yano was going out with a girl two grades above him...
How long were they going out?
From the end of his 2nd year to the summer of the 3rd.
The rumors came out of nowhere and spread like wildfire.
Right now, I am having a really hard time.
You are well enough to be running in gym again?
Oh, I got a 34 on the last math test!
I am finally free of that zero!
I guess next time you will have to get higher than a 56.
You will fail if your average is under 30, right?
Yano is still the same as ever...
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
They do not look alike at all!
What are you guys talking about?
Yamamoto-san's older sister is in here.
You know, the one Yano was going out with!
Hey, anyone have change for a 5,000 yen bill?
I guess it is to be expected.
Since we met, Yano's just been like that.
I guess I just do not know anything about him yet...
That committee meeting lasted longer than I expected...
What class was she in again...?
I still have not looked at it myself.
Though I did not want to see it under these circumstances...
Since I do not know what kind of expression to-
He only goes for pretty faces!
S-She is really pretty, is not she?
In person, she is even prettier.
I have completely lost to her.
She does not really... resemble Yamamoto-san, huh?
Which one of you fell for the other first?
It was love at first sight.
So you started dating right away?
She had a boyfriend at the time.
Er, are you trying to make me look bad?
I have just never seen Yano so fixated on one thing before...
You must have loved to brag about her, huh?
The first I would ever really loved.
My chest hurt, but since Yano smiled as he talked, it quickly settled down.
I probably did not want to accept it...
The existence of someone Yano loved...
I think I might like you...
I just wanted to try sayin-
I am asking if you really, really like me.
Then, let us just forget it.
I do not want something like that.
If we are going to go out, I want you to like me back...
Even though it was the first confession I would made since I was born...
I wonder if I should have pretended to not hear him and said yeah...
Yamamoto, show me you can fill in the rest.
Yano, you stay here and watch.
It is so lukewarm and gross...
I-It is leftover from my lunch.
It is not expired or anything.
Thank goodness... we can still talk normally.
Before, you kept badgering me if I really, really liked you, right?
W-Well... I would not call it badgering...
Do you really, really like someone like me?
You have to hesitate to answer, right?
Are you sure you do not just feel the same way I do?
Want To go get something sweet to eat?
I do not usually see you around here.
Asahi Middle School is around here.
Then that means Yano hangs out here, too?
Want To take a look inside?
Hey, I heard you are in the same class as Yamamoto Yuri?
She must be so dark and annoying.
Yeah, she is nothing like her older sister, huh?
Not only is she antisocial, but she is so creepy, too...
It must be an inferiority complex or something.
After all, those two have always been compared to each other.
You do not know anything about her.
You just judge her by her looks.
We were in the same class for three years of middle school.
I think we would know more about her than you.
You knew her for three years, but those are the only things you can say about her?
You do not know anything yourself.
She cannot even leave messages for people correctly...
That is why Motoharu and Nana-san got into a fight.
That is not something to talk about here.
Why are you guys getting so serious all of a sudden?
I will not forgive anyone who badmouths Nana-san.
Ah... and about Yamamoto's little sister...
She is... yeah, she is fine just the way she is.
She is not as bad as you all say.
This is not homeroom, so quit acting like the class president.
You are the first girl who is ever told me to die.
Then let me say some more!
You can only see Nana-san in your eyes, anyway...
And my mother is not a bitch...
And my girlfriend was a cheat.
She was with another guy when she died in the accident.
They were never through with each another...
I actually do not know if that was really true.
Though, I do not really want to.
But if there is one thing I know for sure, it is this.
If she ever felt that she wanted to see another guy, then...
Ah, I am getting a text message.
Where are you and what are you doing?
I am... taking... Takahashi... san... home.
Ah... you do not have to take me home.
You do not have to, so why do not we go to a pho-
Why do not we go get our picture taken at photo booth together?
I am such an idiot, asking at a time like this.
Would not one that takes our whole picture be better?
I really feels like it is been forever since I have been in one of these.
Actually, when I think about it... he is always smiling.
Yano, you are really strong, are not you?
Normally, a person cannot say the sorts of things you just told me...
I am going to press the confirm button!
You are like the woman of 1,000 masks!
And... I think it is a lot easier to place the blame on yourself than someone else.
Is not it easier to blame someone else?
If you blame someone else, you will just get stubborn and say you will never forgive them.
But when you blame yourself, you can shrug it off since there is nothing you can do about it.
And you will not get angry that way, either.
Basically, I am not being fair.
I pressed the confirm button, by the way.
And not only that... my head's bigger than his.
I look like some octopus alien or something...
Everyone, we decided what we will be doing for the school festival at the last committee meeting.
Unfortunately, due to the large number of classes doing cafes, we were not able to do one.
Sign: What to do for the School Festival
Our third choice, a short play, won in the ballot!
What do you mean our third choice won?!
Takahashi, were you asleep when we voted?!
It is because I suck at rock-paper-scissors...
Since you borrow a classroom instead of the auditorium for those...
I figured that, so I thought about what I could do to increase the audience...
(Still not sure what we are going to do yet, but...)
That will get all the girls here!
Yano, I am going to decide what play to do today.
What do you want to do?
Do whatever the heck you want.
Y-You do not have to get so mad.
Do I always have to clean up your mess?
What are you going to do?
It must be so nice to always take the easy way out.
Sometimes... you can really be a bastard.
So whenever someone does something inconvenient for you, he is a bastard.
This is the person who confessed her love to him last week...
You are just mad about before, are not you?
It is true that I was a little hasty, but...
I guess I do not have a good eye for these sorts of things.
What I said before was a mistake!
What are you talking about again?
W-When I said I liked you, I was wrong!
Ah, how should I put this?
Do either of you have any stories involving murder?!
One that really let us the main character have it?!
Love stories are out of the question!
It seems like Nana wants to kill Yano...
I will draw a mustache on this devil!
There is a student council meeting during lunch tomorrow.
They said they will assign the classrooms for the festival.
Even though you all got together...
Ah... that is a daily thing for them.
That aside, I heard your class is putting on a play?
It is really a pain in the neck.
Let us not talk about him.
He must have done something to really annoy you, huh?
Sometimes he is so cold, it is hard to believe his blood is flowing!
He does not even think of others!
He could be a little more sensitive!
The complete opposite of you, huh?
Even though I am really trying my hardest, I get nothing in return...
When I feel like that, it really aggravates me to see people like him...
Because of Yano, everyone was cool with the play.
You know that type of person, right?
The one who brings a soccer ball to recess, so all of the other kids cheer and go to the field to play.
And when that type of person leaves...
He is one of those types, and I...
If I talk about that moron any more, not only will my mouth rot, but so will my brain!
So, what do you think of that?
From that day forward, we were really busy looking for a good script...
There is a student council meeting during lunch tomorrow.
They said they will assign the classrooms for the festival.
I heard our class might not be able to put on a play after all.
That does not bother me one bit!
I heard Takahashi forgot to go to the room assignment meeting, so we could not get a classroom.
We are not completely out of a classroom yet.
There are still open classrooms in the third building.
That is totally far away from everything!
Nobody would come to that run-down building, anyway!
I just cannot get into this anymore.
I heard the person deciding who goes where forgot about our class.
Nana tried her hardest to protest, but she was told it was too late to move things around.
They did not listen to her at all... they said it was her fault for missing the assignment meeting.
You think some people will still be around?
If anything happens, I will take responsibility.
You do not have to worry about a thing.
You do not have to worry about a thing.
I am telling you, it is already been decided.
Just use one of the leftover rooms.
I am telling you the leftovers are no good, so change it.
Yano has a different way of thinking than most people...
I wonder when I began getting that feeling from him...
Even though he is totally irresponsible, he is serious.
Even though he cuts corners, he is confident.
The first school building was impossible to get, but...
Why do you keep... contradicting yourself, Yano?
I thought... you were not going to clean up after my messes anymore.
In the end, I am just too full of pride, too weak-minded, everyone is friend...
They all mean someone who is too softhearted!
I have no eye for anything...
I confess my love too quickly...
I rely on people too much...
I am not trying to put on a comic skit here!
I do not think that is so bad, though.
Why do you always evade the important questions by saying things like who knows?
You can call it irresponsible or whatever.
You can call it whatever you want, but...
Are not I all right the way I am, not knowing?
Yeah... he might just be all right the way he is...
Watashi hitori ja kokoro ga yuretara
Konna ni mo konna ni mo
Dakedo i am about to wa anata no te wa
Koko ni ite sono te de
Itsumo hitori de aruiteru michi ha
Kaze yo douka suki no kimochi
The first time you gave me
to overflow in the palm of my hand.
it seems like everyone would vanish.
But you still stretched out your
arm and hand to me, just a little bit.
The path I always walk alone
is too wide, and only makes me lonely.
If we walked together, I would be filled
with happiness, and that would be just fine.
I want to be smiling too.
It seems like I am the only one who will disappear.
Oh, wind... please gently tell him
They call that sort of thing being blind.
You have not really fallen in love with anyone before!
They call those sorts of people immature know-it-alls.
Hurry and really fall in love!
Yano, there may not be anyone left who you really love...
I am always watching you, so...
I am always watching over you, so...!
